title: This is a test for the scripts in the autorun folder
author: Amon
htmltext: Did you make sure that the closing tag of this text element is on a new line?

sent.sent: Did you make sure that the closing tag of this text element is on a new line?

children.title: Date and time
children.author: Patrick
children.htmltext: Did you make sure that the datestamp is in ISO8601 format?

sent.sent: Did you make sure that the datestamp is in ISO8601 format?

children.title: Python version
children.author: Amon
children.htmltext: On the server, just run "python autosegment.py" (It will be Python 2).Once you localize the output folder, use Python 3 to run "python autolabel.py". Enjoy your JSON files in the output folder!

sent.sent: On the server just run python autosegment.py It will be Python 2.
Once you localize the output folder use Python 3 to run python autolabel.py. Enjoy your JSON files in the output folder
